titles.title: To name the Capitol Visitor Center after J. Strom Thurmond.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 7/8/2003--Introduced. Designates the Capitol Visitor Center as the J. Strom Thurmond Capitol Visitor Center.
